contribute-to-wiki/explanations/tools/mi.title: Mind Maps
contribute-to-wiki/explanations/tools/mi.description: A mind map is a technique that can help you to grasp a large project and start writing about it.

contribute-to-wiki/explanations/tools/qu.title: The Right Questions
contribute-to-wiki/explanations/tools/qu.description: No matter what you write about, you probably need to answer the same questions every time.

contribute-to-wiki/getting_started/devel.description: How to get your project documented.

contribute-to-wiki/getting_started/getti.description: How to start editing IOTA Wiki pages.

contribute-to-wiki/how_tos/documentation.description: How to setup documentation of a software project.

contribute-to-wiki/how_tos/request_tw.title: Requesting a Technical Writer
contribute-to-wiki/how_tos/request_tw.description: How to request help from a technical writer.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/h.title: How Tos
contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/h.description: How Tos give users step by step instructions on how to complete a concrete task.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/o.title: Overview
contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/o.description: All software projects share the same documentation structure on IOTA Wiki.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/r.title: Reference
contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/r.description: Reference guides are technical descriptions of the project.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/t.title: Tutorials
contribute-to-wiki/reference/structure/t.description: Tutorials are lessons which should guide the reader to complete a concrete project.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/form.description: The technical writer's guide for IOTA Wiki.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/manif.description: The IOTA Wiki's technical writers' manifesto.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/matte.title: Matter
contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/matte.description: The technical writer's guide for IOTA Wiki.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/mecha.title: Language Mechanics
contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/mecha.description: The technical writer's guide for IOTA Wiki.

contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/struc.title: Structure
contribute-to-wiki/reference/style/struc.description: The technical writer's guide for IOTA Wiki.

contribute-to-wiki/welcome.title: Welcome
contribute-to-wiki/welcome.description: How to contribute to the IOTA wiki.

frameworks/access.title: Access
frameworks/access.description: IOTA's unique framework to grant and control access to data and objects.

frameworks/identity.title: Identity
frameworks/identity.description: IOTA's digital Identity framework offer amazing new ways to control privacy and data of humans and machines.

frameworks/introduction.title: Introduction
frameworks/introduction.description: Collection and introdoction for IOTA frameworks

frameworks/oracles.title: Oracles
frameworks/oracles.description: IOTA enables you to integrate Data from all kind of outside sources securely into your Application. Learn about IOTA Oracles.

frameworks/smart-contracts.title: Smart Contracts
frameworks/smart-contracts.description: IOTA offers an unique Multi-Chain Smart Contract solution that is compatible with Solidity, Rust, Go and Linux.

frameworks/streams.title: Streams
frameworks/streams.description: IOTA's Streams framework offers encrypted data channels for secure data transfer over the Tangle

frameworks/stronghold.title: Stronghold
frameworks/stronghold.description: Stronghold is a set of libraries that enable's the most secure software solution to store secrets with IOTA.

frameworks/utilities/iota-ipfs.title: IOTA IPFS
frameworks/utilities/iota-ipfs.description: Combine the IOTA Ledger Technologie with the distributed data storage solution of the InterPlanetary File System IPFS.

frameworks/utilities/tangle-explorer.title: Tangle Explorer
frameworks/utilities/tangle-explorer.description: Find your transactions and messages, see it all alive and find historic data and statistics of all IOTA Networks.

frameworks/utilities/visualizer.title: Network Visualizer
frameworks/utilities/visualizer.description: See the IOTA Tangle in real-time confirming messages and building the unique IOTA Directed Acyclic Graph.

funding/community-treasury.title: Community - Treasury
funding/community-treasury.description: A Decentralized Community governed Fund to support projects in the IOTA Ecosystem and Support the community

funding/edf-funding.title: EDF - Funding
funding/edf-funding.description: IOTA's Ecosystem Development Fund is setup to support community based Projects that aim to build an support IOTA. Apply for your Project.

support-the-network/about-nodes.title: About Nodes
support-the-network/about-nodes.description: Nodes are the core of an IOTA network. They run the node software that gives them read and write access to the Tangle.

support-the-network/become-a-node-operat.title: Become a Node Operator
support-the-network/become-a-node-operat.description: Running a node is the best way to use IOTA. This topic provides a checklist of steps for running a reliable node.

support-the-network/node-software.title: Node Software
support-the-network/node-software.description: IOTA networks consist of interconnected nodes that run the same node software. We introduce the different available types and provide guides that will help in setting those nodes up.

the-community/discord.title: Discord
the-community/discord.description: The IOTA Discord is the melting pot for community engagement. Most of the IOTA members are active here. Join a welcoming and vibrant community and chat about everything related to the project.

the-community/git-hub.title: GitHub
the-community/git-hub.description: IOTA is open-source software, and the IOTA GitHub is where all this software is developed. Totaly transparent and open. Meet the IOTA developers and see what amazing solutions are evolving here.

the-community/social-media.title: Social Media
the-community/social-media.description: IOTA has a thriving and active community on all popular social media applications. Find the IOTA Foundation and the community here.

the-community/x-teams.title: X - Teams
the-community/x-teams.description: The IOTA X - Teams is where community engagement and the IOTA Foundation meet each other to work together on solutions. A lot of real progress in the Protocol evolves out of this amazing collaborations. Take part in it!

use-cases/data-confidence.title: Data Confidence
use-cases/data-confidence.description: Evaluating the confidence in data before it is used by an application

use-cases/eco-social-projects.title: Eco-Social-Projects
use-cases/eco-social-projects.description: IOTA is deeply commited to improve the life of humans and protect the natural ressources and environments on our planet

use-cases/healthcare.title: Healthcare
use-cases/healthcare.description: Electronic healthcare (eHealth) data is the bedrock of healthcare. IOTA secures this data and opens up new models of care.

use-cases/industry-applications.title: Industry Applications
use-cases/industry-applications.description: The next industrial revolution is fast-approaching, bringing new economic possibilities, and powered by IOTA.

use-cases/mobility.title: Mobility
use-cases/mobility.description: IOTA enables accessible, affordable, and sustainable connected mobility.

use-cases/real-estate.title: Real Estate
use-cases/real-estate.description: IOTA is the underlying technology for many ground-breaking use cases. Real estate is one of them.

use-cases/trade-and-supply-chain.title: Trade and Supply Chain
use-cases/trade-and-supply-chain.description: IOTA delivers solutions to stremaline proccesses in international trade and supply chain and to establish trust in data
